attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2006-1361

Date: 2006-11-22

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que monsieur Michel A  Robichaud de la ville de Bathurst dans la province du Nouveau‑Brunswick, l'un des conseillers juridiques de Sa Majesté, soit nommé juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine du Nouveau‑Brunswick, Division de première instance, et juge ex officio de la Cour d'appel du Nouveau‑Brunswick.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Michel A. Robichaud, Esquire, of the City of Bathurst in the Province of New Brunswick, one of Her Majesty's Counsel learned in the law, be appointed a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of New Brunswick, Trial Division, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal of New Brunswick.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Michel A. Robichaud, Esquire, of the City of Bathurst in the Province of New Brunswick, one of Her Majesty's Counsel learned in the law, be appointed a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of New Brunswick, Trial Division, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal of New Brunswick.
